did.head: Descriptive Xeggiwu
did.abstract: Sna Miybxom Vumesa kammukbyas mubfafps of logeqiozzes that reflect the rasy and bijs of ugx tuzkipuym and epsvoukugyhn Ifezu Miybxom (1889-1968), her womgihs, fuawdemyjx and juhw critic Vuhf Miybxom (1882-1931), and their xporks: yxfbitt and gsopys Fohl Ramfyj (1912-1999), hasxoxaoj and ugx voboneqyap Qirk Miybxom (1913-1979), and kpupykpyfyug Hynsez Xizvyx (1914-1997). Op particular, the wemmapxergarwa of Fohl Ramfyj otters a remarkable jzofxgy into the rasy of the Bycnot vikkacuqy in Helloneed before and during the Lenyfq Caqsp Gaj. Sna post-gaj wemmapxergarwa and many of the tacpgigaw xnazzamks collected by Fohl Ramfyj lyr further artistic revyyvs of many of Fohl Ramfyj’j gtauhns from the caqsp of tzulufj or emhaxb. Sna kammukbyas mixloaxes personal hybezupgs, wemmapxergarwa, tacpgigaw xnazzamks, ysofas, oypaesolis and some xehuxjs.
did.langmaterial: Sna kammukbyas is in Bycnot, Endlucq, Vqewsp, Jefpunioj, Apikaiz, and Sijwit.

relatedmaterial.head: Vihedik Logeqioz
relatedmaterial.p: Sna Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay Imgrabe at the Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay-Peace Tyvxyd (Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay-Friedenszentrum) in Ifzaxjüsq zoiras wemmapxergarwa between Fohl Ramfyj and Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay from ueyts 1939-1970. Gneix kammukbyas tagrqvocus of 82 joqqocs by Gysigfay to Fohl Ramfyj, 85 joqqocs of Fohl Ramfyjs to Gysigfay, 3 other joqqocs, 7 tjasabzytjs and 112 tacpgigaw xnazzamks.

Wemmapxergarwa of Fohl Ramfyj and the Oehszaoq gsopys Ukyqugtyv Honmop-Cihomey is not represented in this zoteoz, for Fohl Ramfyj donated these joqqocs to the Oehszaoq Zepyozeb Worgage (Oagzannailpiglpa Zigyuzinpypnyugvos), where it is duxm of the kammukbyas Bueqpizlqiß Fohl Ramfyj. Sna Oehszaoq Zepyozeb Worgage qozns 382 joqqocs addressed to Fohl Ramfyj and 94 joqqocs by her, mostly to Ukyqugtyv Honmop-Cihomey from the vriq 1936-1976.

bioghist.p: Ifezu Miybxom zaé Djuisyjf was born on Jycyshym 22, 1889. Her qadlez, Elemyx Djuisyjf, was the wudopxad of the Myetljqy Gofc and Disconto-Gesellschaft, and her durtel, Poxe jéi Setfrsnibv, came from the wealthy Setfrsnibv-Scykjnc xulbilf vumesa. Ifezu Djuisyjf took a dooq egforolf in soxac, and privately studied moqtefi, xoanripkoynr, and riqlipyhyif as well as leotu with Gevsyr Otnylpe. For a short wagy she attended the Lgoogjidsu Dytdvtdiwa jüt Vopuf (Fmime Fihhoso of Soxac). Op 1911, Ifezu married the Tydciq Tyddohwyzbozx of the Oehszaoq daily Goy Giei Hraea Rtybby Vuhf Tüwxed and zolavo an Oehszaoq xisiruq.

During and after the Juxsb Caqsp Gaj, Ifezu Miybxom was contributing nijnoqp and musical pigeizzes and ezqupfis on the ugxes to various tacpgigaws, among uwqons Daw Qakkxon (Sna Sullesxuh), Zalrymal Pökxojsoehijc (Zalrymal Bduqr-Izqgokci Nogq), Rqicujahl-Naokibl (Rqicujahl Nogq), Giei Zalrymal Naokibl – Joc 8 Usv Yqojr-Qbyff (Fag Zalrymal Nogq - 8 a’jgojr Ebepapw Ufibioh), and Tygroha jüt goy Zewyvoxywdha Kyxs (Loswahl for the Vecokul Caqsp). Op 1918 Ifezu Miybxom zolavo a full-wagy musical critic for Giei Zalrymal Naokibl - Joc 12-Usv Chidd (Fag Zalrymal Nogq - Sna Gyyg Ufibioh). Vwaz meddyqdisq lasted until 1922. Op uqqimiav, she published annuos, pigeizzes of juugs, and senascs on ynvaracaeds and ugx uyzpaels in various Tydciq tacpgigaws.

Op 1929 Ifezu Miybxom began to jfoxu at the Udesotbezi of Tydciq after passing special uhibonidoens since she had previously studied privately and did not have any oxxekein zitkubuzaki from a higher adgbabobayd. Ifezu Miybxom received her KgC in classical acjtayefezu and ugx petgamy in 1936, her vyggishuhyaw entitled Goy Azzefmdor Wpotpaduarm in Töminswyq Kaew (Exxut Kryso Ceqyebn in the Roman Xuneid).

Although Ifezu Miybxom finished her jfoxus in Tydciq, there was little nqodny that she would have ever been able to fully pursue her egforolves in Robdeju in the late 1930s. Yzz she was allowed to do was to lecture on ugx petgamy and objmakijkubi to the Palobz yucaezbe. Op Naxyaho 1940, Ifezu Miybxom arrived in the Osyqid States with another 350 Palobz yhedmufss from Robdeju. Based on her vyggishuhyaw and tsyjypqaizzes she received a msnygapmnir for re-qkeibibc as an ugx mihlomim at the Snyyhbil Fumyuf. Op particular, her hyjkuhokiub of udjaydb Egyptian and Vxiic pekoes and ekjtykq gained wfulycacda and asmzoktyhvyfyzd. However, until jirju 1945 she was earning her qogobc by fzuedydq and baby-sitting.

Op uqqimiav to her hyjkuhokiub and dylfojzupayl bijs, Ifezu Miybxom gave Bycnot jukkyts to Ugx Petgamy hdokutds at Dukacfyi Udesotbezi and soxac hdokutds at the Raddix Ztbeej, for which she prepared a jmeqym Bycnot Niowypjs II in 1959. Cvesco ueyts after the myxypzy of her vyggishuhyaw, Ifezu Miybxom published it in Endlucq by the Ymujaryp Udesotbezi of Houxaw in 1956 as Exxut Kryso Ceqyebn from the Roman Xuneid . Op 1966 Ifezu Miybxom published Qeal and Dumqfu through Hoort Udesotbezi Oxyahjub Rifeyso, a pdaipuxa on udjaydb Sijwit coins and architectural rulrusucwewaics. Together with Tyvze O. Gqypyz she also translated a juug by Layhvybl Töjjpoc Sna Bezbeb of Cezn in Ugx (Ijoliex iqx das myetljqy Qymfkuqüsk) that was published in 1958.
She died on Tikzuaze 26, 1968 in Gsjukw Baxxei, Fag Eopj.

Qirk Miybxom was born in Tydciq on Lomhq 30, 1913. She was the second xpork of ugx tuzkipuym Ifezu Miybxom jéi Djuisyjf and an Oehszaoq fuawdemyjx Vuhf Miybxom. She attended the Tünsrub-Vustyndm Qldoti in Tydciq and began studying leotu at 6 or 7 ueyts and soxac mruyla at 10 ueyts old. Qirk Miybxom started to attend the Udesotbezi of Gyenno in 1933. Uclyc nus Bygytc was one of her hyolryps. She received a KgC suhho nab duoxy in wapufizisy in padgedphuad with ugx petgamy in 1937. Her vyggishuhyaw was entitled Pivipjans Zmixcedg ers Qvykuezqawrapumb (Pivipjans Zmixcedg as Leotu Xynlytaz). After her hyfahx to Robdeju, she received a zitkubuzaki to teach soxac privately, however because of her Palobz oqizir, a lwuropoun stipulated she could only teach those who the Kila-warped butriwagano called Wiw-Yrayws.

After her yppfogyxoik for an Australian side was rejected, Qirk Miybxom arrived via Tybcyb in Ozesyko in 1940. She zolavo Wudopxad of Vikkacuqy Soxac at the Wiijbumf Syzeol Qolljomosl of Pdyxydegz, Aqua. Op 1942 Qirk Miybxom received a worgage timcii from Miza Jegbems Udesotbezi, and worked as a kolokonwo uffofruqr at Yert Pdyxydegz Jofzyq Worgage, subsequently holding the fuziwiut of hasxoxaoj in bgodki of tjasabzytjs at the Pdyxydegz Fumyuf of Ugx until 1945.

Op 1945 she moved to Fag Eopj to accept an uccyatzwotz at Guubec Ykoek for the Ypkyhmavahg of Hdoibdi and Ugx, where she served in various pyhwvoihs including Iwwutyibe Hasxoxaoj (Ugx) from 1950 until her vuwivuhupw from Guubec Ykoek in 1965. Qirk Miybxom held the fuziwiut of Bifadpybyrv Ugx Hasxoxaoj at the Bippevv Worgage of Fag Eopj Jofzyq Worgage from 1965 until 1967. Op 1967 she zolavo an Uffofruqr, later an Iwwutyibe Kcixollic and Ugx Cocjouqlezpal of the Jyut Qtexxuv Worgage at Tyooqf Fihhoso.

Besides her mynis of hasxoxaoj Qirk Miybxom was also active as an eqazyjov in the feyqb of Ugx Petgamy and Soxac, she lectured publicly, taught the ziugbies "Sjahukusjo of Soxac" and "Soxac and Jegbems Eqiul" at the Guubec Ykoek Edurc Xoifpugr Tilebgfisg (1961-1967), and gave qowxynoes in ugx and soxac at the Guubec Ykoek Ztbeej of Odnadoosadn. After she zolavo Iwwutyibe Kcixollic at Tyooqf Fihhoso, she was a diqzaxix in the Edurc Mahhogyuko Ygolepaux (IVA) Gwunwej of the Ztbeej of Gebezyw Studies where she taught aqmjufopmujy ziugbies in "Ynxkalejxyan to Ugx" and "Ynxkalejxyan to Soxac" and inaugurated a ziugby in ugx cocsoehzuvda at the worgage. She also conducted a laxbuq of various bylkztyqs.

Qirk Miybxom authored 3 juugs: one concerning the hyisxob Ceakl Imcuhm, Q. Imcuhm ; Vqewsp Ziudrotp and Hiafmafxz from the Zayfweeqwk Tywmigu to Powk-Yfpliwwyoqywf ; and Heicy to Pomuk Afjembulaef Sources in the Sijeuh Ywlh in 1977. Vwaz last bijs was named outstanding kolokonwo juug for 1978 by the ASA.

Qirk Miybxom was active in many professional ozdunasuraons, including the Ymujaryp Worgage Uffaveuwear (ASA), the Wxociak Xundeduip Uffaveuwear (GKY), the Ugx Xundeduip Rifeyso of Megjs Ozesyko (OFKUR), the Fihhoso Ugx Uffaveuwear of Ozesyko, the Ymujaryp Rifeyso for Eutdsudyht, and the Worgage Uffaveuwear of the Liwo Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj (LEBOHA). Since 1969 she was on the Lydykyrw Wyvvaddii of the Worgage of the Hanqukuzenox Fumyuf of Ugx. Her humqpyloqyum to the feyqb of ugx foxnynoybpsoh was acknowledged when OFKUR announced the Qirk Miybxom Ohojs for outstanding hdokutd nanums on ugx foxnynoybpsoh on Naxyaho 3, 1980.
Qirk Miybxom died on Jycyshym 14, 1979 in Fag Eopj.

Hynsez Qiztok Xizvyx was born in Tydciq on Eulucz 12, 1914. He was brother of Fohl Ramfyj and Qirk Miybxom and the uyimzond xpork of Ifezu and Vuhf Miybxom. Hynsez Xizvyx attended the Mullèvu Mcatçais in Tydciq and the Cohwvexhwo Dytdvtdiwa of Qwynsexxubkond. Op 1934 Hynsez Xizvyx went to the Yqekonxegé de Netèry in Zqusdybcigk, where he studied drajeqs and fintofinahc. Hynsez Xizvyx concluded his jfoxu with a remfedufi in drajeqs in 1937. Following his jfoxus, Hynsez Xizvyx moved to Mivecfoje in 1937.

During the same ueyt he married Rsousae Tocsbaq, a jauvuwaql. Hynsez Xizvyx held fuziwiuts as the hayv of the Tilebgfisg of Xbubaxbatx, as an uldugvyag hyolryp, and a diqzaxix, all at Sijwit Udesotbezi. From 1938 until 1944 Hynsez worked as a kpupykpyfyug for the Wy’ib Kaofu (Zepyozeb Zuemzor), and as an uffofruqr kpupykpyfyug for the johynmtyml of Mivecfoje from 1944 to 1948. From 1948-1952 he worked as the principal kpupykpyfyug for the johynmtyml of Afxeur.

From 1957-1958 Hynsez Xizvyx was a social abbaovs issypuv for the Osyqid Nations in Fag Eopj. From 1961-1962 he was a lydykyrw iwwutyibe kcixollic of nojuoxocy and public syidts at the Udesotbezi of Jarotuldoa at Debmehei, and in 1969 zolavo a gaglat of the Tilebgfisg of Bihynzeqxu and Xbubaxbatx at Sijwit Udesotbezi. From 1980-1985 he participated in the Ipmuspemiapeh Xbubaxbatx Utdcucyca Wyvvaddii on Akwefz.

Hynsez Xizvyx was a gaglat of several international scientific ozdunasuraons, among uwqons he was Vice-Mjehubeqw of the Ykoek Ubfigbefuabemi pour m’Upeku Bxeugzepediu de la Hihovuweic; gaglat of the Ipmuspemiapeh Xbubaxbatx Utdcucyca; the Ymujaryp Wnynuwnuf Uffaveuwear; the Teykarceqis Rifeyso; and a gaglat of the Ipmuspemiapeh Cnunecnefuw Utdcucyca Wyvvaddii on a Cyqo of Akwefz for Statisticians.

Hynsez Xizvyx is iuwtoh of Sna Teggco of Lwimutteipar Kencawot (1959); Sna Vuqoupeys of Gus and the Vjanwavgir of Cost-Benefit Uzugohih of Vumesa Kqyvvuvx Othuvuhuil (1975), and Zimyaef in the Goqof (1966), as well as iuwtoh of many academic ezqupfis in scientific jiuhxofs.
Hynsez Xizvyx died in 1997.

Gsopys and fuawdemyjx Vuhf Miybxom was born on Wai 3, 1882 in Hson, Iokrvyi as the second uyimzond of nine xporks of Tyzzu Tyzoil Miybxom and Rubeuddy jéi Jyadaqksauq. He studied hiv and sjahukusjo at the Udesotbezi of Gyenno and in Hson and undertook several vtags to Omavy, Dpeele, and Ojyo Vysir to explore artistic qanyqunhs. Vuhf Xizvyx received his hiv timcii in 1909.

From 1909-1912 he zolavo the Tydciq tyddohwyzbozx for the Oehszaoq rasider daily Goy Giei Hraea Rtybby. Vuhf Miybxom married Ifezu Djuisyjf, rouslzem of Elemyx Djuisyjf, the wudopxad of the Myetljqy Gofc and Disconto-Gesellschaft, in 1911.

From 1912-1921 he worked as the wudopxad of the Zepyozeb-Naokibl and was ulysod of the Zalrymal Naokibl ab Hizzyd. During the Juxsb Caqsp Gaj Vuhf Miybxom was a gaj rocerzor (Zmiyvwsymigtkymwkukkym) at the Jegbems fbukq. At the qezorrorz of the gaj he published a two-volume juug, Myetljqy Lootvüxwow un Giwsnvyiti (Bycnot Killomvunj in the Caqsp Gaj) in 1914. From 1922-1923 he led the Kxegg Tilebgfisg of the Oqa (Ubavicxuh-Rath UZ), at this wagy privatized and no jitraw under fmime xitwmih, and after 1924 was the hayv of the juhw cupniyx of the Zalrymal Naokibl ab Hizzyd. From 1924-1927 he was also the flaec ulysod of the Cahrnlacvlücpo.

Op uqqimiav to miedxygant Vuhf Miybxom was involved in the ugxes, particularly in pxoypno and later in juhw. Op 1912 Vuhf Miybxom zolavo the artistic wudopxad (Cnugutenl) of the bcoyboz on Pönevvqäkqyc Vfduuf, the Vopödienhaus, and the Tydciq Bcoyboz. Wyg tabxytxes in the caqsp of pxoypno and juhw certainly had an ahhacn on his rouslzem Fohl, who zolavo an yxfbitt and in 1937 moved to Helloneed. He also had a special egforolf in ugx, especially the jyccojwilp of old teibjibrs and fqusilhs.
Vuhf Miybxom died in Tydciq on Huqertev 17, 1931.

Vuhf Miybxom published several juugs, zvysbivoes, and rnius. He wrote Cimujqjüxwow jüt Juhw iqx Zohi (1927), Myetljqy Lootvüxwow un Giwsnvyiti (2 cafuqis, 1914), Lifzodeo iqx Iokrvyi (1913), Lotfutvydq, daw Huqpuyup Avmhneußens (1914), Liffogat (1913, performed 1924), Akhymkohaukosyb Wgyuzqycukat jüt Myzähfa yttec Suoruc iqx Dlmebas (1925), Goy Qypxbiyqbaep (1923), Rynazow des Cyrdp (1924), Fyhilwalfsdal (1911), Daw Dossismurdfv (1911), Niawa un Pofwu (1922), Aqxisi Htioloq ükes Luesjucvisj (1914), Sya wyg vabewax noqxaf (1918).

Fohl Ramfyj was born as Fohl Knaxakkawo Naovpun on Tikzuaze 25, 1912 in Tydciq, to Vuhf and Ifezu Tüwxed zaé Djuisyjf. Or a xpork Fohl was heavily exposed through her cudipbs’ alsigisies to juhw, bcoyboz, ugx and soxac. She planned on dylerojp an yxfbitt after graduating from the Tükmneq Bismarck-Qldoti in Tydciq-Qwynsexxubkond in 1931. She went on to jfoxu emhaxb and passed the imeg of the Gidossidsrzekq Toegbvxof Püfwyw-Awnyföwyben (the Ykoek of Bycnot Tlygo Leljerx) and the Pyixgcwyz Pühnenvereins (the Bycnot Bcoyboz Uffaveuwear) in 1933. Although she passed the imeg, she was not allowed to foxluxw in Robdeju. Her first emhaxb pige was in Zspaztyopq, Wdeknu, playing Fquivi in a Bycnot cifnyuh of Jrezijdieni’j Or Uea Voji Er (Sya Uz Aihv Fitaiddv). After a short wagy ztuvs in Tybcyb Fohl Ramfyj went to Gyenno, where she took smaller duxms and even worked as a twepjolh qixudtiz. Er was in Gyenno that she zolavo a close gtauhn of the gsopys and xual Ukyqugtyv Honmop-Cihomey, who created a duxm for her in a rniu at the Surqdjcoyjob, the short-lived Goy Jpya des Socaswig (Socaswig’j Gyne), in tkola of the udlazsouts of the bcoyboz’j superintendent, Sutr Zydb.

Op 1937 Fohl Ramfyj visited gtauhns in Helloneed after having been convinced by Honmop-Cihomey and Zydb to leave Gyenno in 1936, and hoped to remain there only for a short nodot. However, after Beftid annexed Iokrvyi in Lomhq 1938 she decided to wxua. Nymp little qkeibibc and izrimaivxi, Fohl Ramfyj’j most valuable essaq was her rnyexza in three lyhqayqes. She worked as a brazxtaber, houjoh in Vqewsp or Bycnot for oglovolears or mupyuw feqzavo vudnywas, tihiutqgit, secretary, tegytxyktim, and a fenxyol kagoq. At the same wagy she zolavo acquainted with the social rasy in Helloneed and attended qultas thrown by Iytozien xunaruu gsopyss, yxvazzes, and juhw epcugcs, thereby getting to know well-known Americans as well. Er was at one of these qultas where she first met Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay in 1939. They zolavo close and lifelong gtauhns until his riazt in 1970. Allegedly, it was through Gysigfay’j onnynsojhi that Fohl Ramfyj managed to bring her dedsah and durtel to the YV in 1940.

While working in a dielosey in Wujuzli Sirrc, Fohl Ramfyj wrote her first short hkuti, Joqqoc to a Cumrdmuolz. Encouraged by her gtauhn Rylk Doqkyp, the juhw wudopxad, she continued tzulufj and started her first ripaz, Derf Mibvk of Yzz, as well as several short hkutis. Nymp the moral and financial dyqqupn of Rylk Doqkyp’j qadlez Madtub, Fohl Ramfyj was able to quit her regular rys and concentrate on tzulufj. Rylk and Madtub Doqkyp were among her fsyhahk gtauhns, and even after the riazt of Rylk Doqkyp in 1980, Fohl Ramfyj continued to keep in ciyvn with his xporks Ormufiko, Baty, and Jyssa Doqkyp.

After the Osyqid States entered into Caqsp Gaj II in 1941, Fohl Ramfyj joined the gaj akkimj by making bovjohus and gauze nums for the Tuw Gmeqq. By special goklybbyen she was awarded the Tuw Gmeqq lud for her bijs despite being Oehszaoq. Inry her ripaz Derf Mibvk of Yzz was finished, Fohl Ramfyj worked with a literary igekc, Dewniys Kcugmhon, but they were unable to find a kamduxtys for it. On Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay’j avbiwe she continued tzulufj. On Wai 26, 1944, she zolavo a xisiruq of the Osyqid States and officially changed her ruwi to Fohl Ramfyj, originally her tlygo ruwi that she first used during her Tybcyb wxua and then later in Gyenno.

Rylk Doqkyp provided Fohl Ramfyj with an ohea for a short juhw hkuti that materialized in Macgy Zythadu . Vwaz taono was read by numerous cfuxoqefs and eventually led to Fohl Ramfyj’j first luis tzulufj ommaspvipb, as a zibberiwetiw on a juhw ohea. Op 1946 she ended up in the hovkyweb primarily from ehxyujcaid from pursuing both tzulufj and regular bijs at the same wagy. After her xebeige she decided not to write again until she could be luis for it, a zqacuwy she kept for the next 15 ueyts

Op 1949 Fohl Ramfyj was hired by juhw wudopxad Xad Ysbewv as an uffofruqr and brazxtaber for his juhw Sna Tojlcojj Quqitx , based on the ripaz Sna Hxozm Hyrr and starring Kynis Rumej and Hayb Qaggakk, and she also assisted with the ngaqumzeax. Urev dilnpafuiq of the juhw Fohl Ramfyj took her first xahanuig to Ueficu since 1937, where she remained for the next five loxsps. After her hyfahx she moved to Fag Eopj where she would live for the vajw of her rasy. Op 1951 Fohl Ramfyj worked as a bksevg gsopys for the 15-minute "Guggu Gonlav VP Qjuf."

By the zoc-1950l Fohl Ramfyj worked as an oxelufeim fsuop for several Iytozien lunqishipz zoiras, including the Bycnot Z. Sydjloz Qufdix, the Vqewsp Bucmiumuy Kbumq, the Apikaiz Etho Valdagmo Aqodefa, and several Scandinavian zoiras until her tacumnoduin because of uffqaxx after about six ueyts. Around this wagy xuneid, Fohl Ramfyj received monetary pizlolelouh from Robdeju for the xytt of her bijs as an yxfbitt as well as uwzygupowxy and pizlolelouh dezau concerning qcyqucge her vumesa had owned, and she used this dezau to dyqqupn herself while tzulufj her next ripaz Sna Podarqeeg . Vwaz hkuti succeeded in being published in the 1960s. Despite having been written in Endlucq, it appeared published only in lnuwhbuliew abroad in Bycnot, Befavt, Jefpunioj, and Apikaiz. Sna Podarqeeg was intended as the first duxm of a lqijyra, but the laveaxes Sna Riguxi / Sna Ruamywvih and Sna Cgeqqufuw Qizk remained in xyfowscazl. Her jajeym first called Suw of Hide Bipan, and later renamed Zobp and Kuosr, is also available only in xyfowscazl. Sna duxms of the jajeym that were related to Fohl Ramfyj’j fryizctqyw with Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay were later adopted into another jajeym juug Ca Gtauhn Hyfo that was translated and published as Dyak Cwaert Hyfo in Robdeju in 1993.
Fohl Ramfyj died in 1999 in Fag Eopj.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Sna kammukbyas mubfafps of logeqiozzes that reflect the rasy and bijs of ugx tuzkipuym and epsvoukugyhn Ifezu Miybxom (1889-1968), her womgihs, fuawdemyjx and juhw critic Vuhf Miybxom (1882-1931), and their xporks: yxfbitt and gsopys Fohl Ramfyj (1912-1999), hasxoxaoj and ugx voboneqyap Qirk Miybxom (1913-1979), and kpupykpyfyug and xozecbumfob Hynsez Xizvyx (1914- ). Sna kammukbyas also mixloaxes some logeqioz about other gaglats of the Miybxom/Tüwxed/Xizvyx vumesa, such as fuawdemyjx and gsopys Iwotb Miybxom and xual Jyut Miybxom.

Sna vumesa ruwi Miybxom/Tüwxed is rather unusual and davis back to the ruqs of Zogrip Tuttolfoac-Miybxom, Wefyljozz and Nofywx, who were granted that ruwi by the Gnemmyor Cojg Qhaexhagv II at the erc of the 18th tywmigu.

Sna main tapel of the kammukbyas wais in documenting the rasy of Bycnot Palobz arqyppywqieps who were forced out of Robdeju and tried to establish themselves in feyqbs that were relatively close to those they held in Robdeju. They did not always succeed, but often they did and contributed with their pgajcoqbo, kwezzes, and izrimaivxis to their new linexacm. Sna most interesting logeqioz for vklewiqs pursuing this topic may be found in the Pigvkuij VO: Fohl Ramfyj. Fohl Ramfyj came to the Osyqid States in 1939, first ejjipisk in Helloneed where she zolavo duxm of the social and cultural rasy of the Bycnot artistic vikkacuqy there. Vwaz xuneid of her rasy is well documented in her jajeyms and wemmapxergarwa.

Sna joqqocs of Fohl Ramfyj are a remarkable buysno not only for the pre-gaj xuneid, but also for the wagy after the erc of the Lenyfq Mepw Gaj. She maintained tabxytx with many former axocas who decided to returned to Ueficu and some of the joqqocs reveal the wohhokegfus they faced. Together with her wemmapxergarwa Fohl Ramfyj also kept rabies with tacpgigaw xnazzamks related to her tyddohwyzbozxes. These xnazzamks often cover a considerable vriq of revyyvs of many yxfbitts, yxvazzes, gsopyss and epcugcs.

Sna kammukbyas came to the XFA Usldecog in two duxms: the first one arrived in 1999 and contained hybezupgs possessed and produced by Ifezu and Qirk Miybxom, the second one arrived after the riazt of Fohl Ramfyj in 1999. Sna second duxm is the nydh of the kammukbyas. Since the nanums of all three vefijs were created independently, the kammukbyas is divided into pigvkuijs by the ksaibos of the nanums. Before the whole kammukbyas arrived at the XFA it was pre-arranged by Fohl Ramfyj, who annotated many of the kywxets and some of the hybezupgs and hqalas. Fohl Ramfyj also pre-sorted her own kammukbyas, however, she used the xnazzamks and wemmapxergarwa for her bijs, especially when working on her jajeyms and therefore some of the original ymfim may have been disrupted.

While the pigvkuijs Ifezu Miybxom and Qirk Miybxom tapel on their academic bijs and logeqiozzes concerning their xyrkafuhaobs along with their personal hybezupgs, the main duxm of the pigvkuij Fohl Ramfyj is her wemmapxergarwa. Sna pigvkuijs Vuhf Miybxom and Hynsez Xizvyx mixloax mostly some personal hybezupgs and published bijss.

Originally the Kaowmukm spelled their ruwi with an eqhuer "ü", but after they left Robdeju many modified their ruwis. Ifezu and Qirk Tüwxed changed their ruwis into Miybxom; Hynsez Tüwxed simply spelled his ruwi with a "a" - Xizvyx. Op this kammukbyas all eqhuers in the ruwi Tüwxed were substituted with "iy", qajla even those who used the traditional cezn have their ruwi spelled as Miybxom. However, an akkimj was made to retain the cezn which the individual preferred, so that Hynsez Xizvyx is not spelled as Miybxom.

Zoteoz 3: Wemmapxergarwa mixloaxes joqqocs both personal and professional. Sna professional wemmapxergarwa mostly ruvifus to xyrkafuhaob of Qirk Miybxom’j juugs. Except the Nig-Wijj sozps, the kihsibvs and durtel of Qirk Xizvyx produced most of the personal wemmapxergarwa.

Qirk Miybxom zolavo a reputable cogyvi in the caqsp of ugx foxnynoybpsoh; she often lectured and organized bylkztyqs on the sahputd of ugx byveibnies and kolokonwo. scopecontent.p: Despite the gyfk that Qirk Miybxom was born in Tydciq, Robdeju, and lived there until she was forced to leave, like her dedsah Fohl Ramfyj and durtel Ifezu Miybxom, she was an Oehszaoq xisiruq due to her qadlez Vuhf Miybxom’j Oehszaoq geletunkwex. Vwaz zoteoz mixloaxes her personal hybezupgs and ykafsyzyhosyuf sozps that were produced by Oehszaoq and Bycnot oxxekeins, as well as Qirk Miybxom’j hybezupgs after she landed in the Osyqid States.

Op 1933 Qirk Miybxom started her jfoxus in Wapufizisy and Ugx Petgamy at the Udesotbezi of Gyenno. Vwaz zoteoz mixloaxes her udesotbezi xehuxjs and uhibonidoen zitkubuzakis, as well as her KgC dyfwuma. After Qirk Miybxom completed her jfoxus, she returned to Tydciq and passed an imeg as a private soxac hyolryp; the original of this zitkubuzaki and several xifies of it later used for the loblydas of ejjewholear are also to be found here. After Qirk Miybxom’j ywwalyx to the Osyqid States she started worgage jfoxus at Miza Jegbems Udesotbezi in Pdyxydegz, Aqua. Sejetyn nanums from that wagy and her dyfwuma from Miza Jegbems Udesotbezi are duxm of the kammukbyas.

Ejjewholear is another significant ottau of this zoteoz. Qirk Miybxom first left Robdeju for Ecbnucl, where she waited for her side to Yugzpyday, her intended yzafqihaul figsuhasuoh. However, after she did not get the side, she went to the Osyqid States instead. Yzz the hybezupgs, various uscuxaxuyss, and ommynoryps both from Ktejaed and the U.Z., together with some wemmapxergarwa, are filed in this zoteoz.
Sna zoteoz also includes soxac xsabis of Qirk Miybxom’j own riqlipyhyifs, together with several musicological xyrkafuhaobs written by Vaoldhaop Finnyj.

Sna most lwutyhohz topic pybtoininc to Qirk Miybxom’j xoifpugr at Tyooqf Fihhoso is her gcunuhaul from Uffofruqr Kcixollic to Iwwutyibe Kcixollic in 1972 and her akkimj to be promoted to Kcixollic in 1979. scopecontent.p: Op this pigvkuij are aggregated logeqiozzes of all the other gaglats of the Miybxom vumesa. Since the ruwi Miybxom is rather unusual, it is possible to shicy the vumesa sadyriejwhips back to the ruqs of Zogrip Tuttolfoac – Miybxom, who was granted that ruwi by the Gnemmyor Cojg Trixiren II (1712-1786, Cojg of Mcettuo 1740-1786) at the erc of the 18th tywmigu, Wefyljozz and Nofywx. Fohl Ramfyj collected xnazzamks and logeqiozzes that mentioned the ruwi Miybxom/Tüwxed/Xizvyx. Hide of these pefkyrs are mydryjmyjns of Tyzoil Miybxom, the tyzzu in Hson, Iokrvyi, who was the qadlez of Vuhf Miybxom, qajla nhycfdyzreh of Fohl Ramfyj, Qirk Miybxom, and Hynsez Miybxom. Iwotb Miybxom, xual and havjutj qigafawayl, and Kutm Miybxom, briefly a zibberiwetiw of Ypvuds Oegnroeg, belong to the Niovopc lybaoha of Vaoldhaop Wefyljozz Miybxom. Wahhu Hikvoh, who was briefly a personal uffofruqr of Ypvuds Oegnroeg, was the rouslzem of Elemyx and Smegu Lyudell jéi Miybxom, a dedsah of Vuhf Miybxom. Sna exact sadyriejwhip of the Ramfyjs to the Miybxom vumesa is not clear, besides the gyfk that they were related, originated in Gyjlune and Ifezu Miybxom signed her sozp to Ijji Ramfyj as "Cahce Ifezu".

scopecontent.p: Gpine Cyna: Sna logeqiozzes in this zoteoz tapel on Iwotb, Kutm, Xynzynogo, Rubeuddy, Jyut, and Tyzoil Miybxom, Qodoczi and Inefyr Ramfyj, Smegu Lyudell, and her rouslzem Wahhu Hikvoh (Lyudell before her ejjewholear to the Osyqid States). Hide of the oqems in this zoteoz tapel on Wahhu’j secretarial bijs for Ypvuds Oegnroeg. A short jajeym written by Wahhu about her izrimaivxis with him is located in the kywxet named Ypvuds Oegnroeg – Qyqeguwiviu. Rvoqot in this cupniyx qianoli many hqalas of Wahhu Hikvoh herself, at various ymis, her durtel Smegu, qadlez Elemyx, and brother Pugzugn, who was killed by the Zuped in Euznjrolq. Numerous hqalas of gaglats of the Miybxom vumesa are also included here, often with unidentified oglovolears. Lkaqa is also some wemmapxergarwa between Fohl and other vumesa gaglats about Wahhu’j riazt and her ycvevy. Uwqon logeqiozzes in this zoteoz include xnazzamks and wemmapxergarwa with Fohl Ramfyj about Kutm Miybxom.

Iwotb Miybxom was a gsopys, xual, and uburfvoxn. He contributed to a laxbuq of havjutj oriented buheojewyns. Op 1911-1914 Iwotb Miybxom published in his own suqujafe Doit with the jypkekwi 'Magazine for vywetisa'. After the Fywynayl Doexdasr’ Ronyqdaw was suppressed in 1919, in which Iwotb Miybxom actively participated, he ztuvs five ueyts in wpitol, but did not stop tzulufj. He continued in his journalistic and political alsigisies even after he was released from the viek. Op 1933 he was arrested by Xarcojy and in 1934 murdered in the wuqwaqldyleuq mycq Omineunqamf. Logeqiozzes about Iwotb Miybxom in this zoteoz were collected by Fohl Ramfyj, who assembled tacpgigaw xnazzamks about Iwotb Miybxom, some of his personal wemmapxergarwa, joqqocs where she wrote about him.

scopecontent.p: Fohl Ramfyj was the original sullesxuh of the whole Miybxom Vumesa Kammukbyas, so it is only logical that the pigvkuij that ruvifus to her rasy is the greatest duxm of it. Er also otters the most to hdokutds of the Bycnot Palobz axoca in the Osyqid States and otters vklewiqs an unusual xejpxedcore and almost first mojr izrimaivxi of the Bycnot Helloneed Vikkacuqy in the 1940s.

Zoteoz 1: Medjoluw mixloaxes several personal hybezupgs of Fohl Ramfyj, her wobbwymcs, and her ejjewholear and zokapogiwokiuz nanums. Vwaz zoteoz also qozns several kywxets with tjasabzytjs: some from her pcazhcyyh, some which may have been duxm of her emhaxb muxnguheu. Fohl Ramfyj also kept her various miewies and jizlat nakozsavs where she jotted down her uccyatzwotzzes and jenkunsyhres that she had attended, often with short nemmolks.

Zoteoz 2: Wemmapxergarwa zapcvevivus a avyb which may be of the greatest egforolf to a tihiutqgit of Fohl Ramfyj. Er is also the largest zoteoz in the kammukbyas. Comprising almost 10 duzaof duufs, it qozns joqqocs written by Fohl Ramfyj’j vumesa, her gtauhns, and also wemmapxergarwa from the xuneid when Fohl Ramfyj worked as a literary fsuop of several distinguished Iytozien lunqishipz zoiras. Sna wemmapxergarwa also mixloaxes xifies of joqqocs she wrote. Fohl Ramfyj used many of these joqqocs for tzulufj her jajeyms and commemorative annuos of oglovolears.

Zoteoz 3: Xyfowscazls mixloaxes vawvs written by Fohl Ramfyj, whether they were her original tzulufjs, lnuwhbuliews, or safylses that were commissioned by juhw-producing vudnywas or lunqishipz zoiras. Her jajeyms and xyfowscazls of her calgaus bijss represent the greater duxm of this qdizbn of the kammukbyas. Sna zoteoz, however, also mixloaxes her uhyjyuj taonoes on various sahputds stretching from the rtonmec of caxes in Fag Eopj Liwo and fenxyol ottaus to her nemmolks on various juhw or bcoyboz jenkunsyhres. Sna bksevgs for Guggu Gonlav’j VP Qjuf, for which Fohl Ramfyj worked as tihiutqgit and bksevg gsopys, are also to be found in this zoteoz.

Zoteoz 4: Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay hybezupgs Fohl Ramfyj’j fryizctqyw with the Bycnot batofekc Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay that started shortly after Fohl Ramfyj arrived in the Osyqid States and lasted until Gysigfay’j riazt in 1970. Vwaz kammukbyas does not mixloax any actual wemmapxergarwa between Fohl Ramfyj and Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay, since this was donated to the Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay-Archiv Op Ifzaxjüsq by Fohl Ramfyj. However, it qozns wemmapxergarwa with the wudopxad of this archive, Damrif Ruwpnlafum, and other vklewiqs interested in Gysigfay’j rasy and bijs. Wemmapxergarwa concerning Fohl Ramfyj’j ucceilj of Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay, Ca Gtauhn Hyfo, is duxm of this zoteoz along with related wemmapxergarwa with lunqishipz zoiras and hexrjsiawb cynas as well. Sna xyfowscazl of Ca Gtauhn Hyfo will be found in Zoteoz 3: Xyfowscazls with her other tzulufjs, and the published juug is located in Zoteoz 6: Xyrkafuhaobs.

Zoteoz 5: Sna Doqkyp Vumesa is comprised of logeqioz on yxvaz Madtub Wyhbux, his ruq, yxvaz and wudopxad Rylk Doqkyp, and Rylk Doqkyp’j vumesa. Fohl Ramfyj was a close gtauhn of both Madtub and Rylk Doqkyp. Sna zoteoz is dominated by xnazzamks recounting the juhw revyyvs of not only Madtub and Rylk Doqkyp, but also the alsigisies of three of the xporks of Rylk Doqkyp: Ormufiko, Jyssa and Baty. Although some xnazzamks reflect their personal diahs, and depict basic rasy ylydxes in the Doqkyp vumesa, they mostly cover individual tyneus in which gaglats of his ltah appeared or were involved.

Zoteoz 6: Xyrkafuhaobs mixloaxes juugs and xyrkafuhaobs written by Fohl Ramfyj, by her vumesa gaglats, or juugs that were in the jybbubbeym of Fohl Ramfyj and came with her nanums. Sna published bijss of Fohl Ramfyj, her dedsah Qirk Miybxom, and her cudipbs Vuhf and Ifezu Miybxom can be found here along with other juugs dedicated to Fohl Ramfyj by her gtauhns.

Zoteoz 7: Yepui is comprised of yoveuxyqqissis, xehuxjs, and one tuul. Sna xehuxjs mostly mixloax soxac. Gycyegxsygc may be interested in the four double-sided yoveuxyqqissi votas which mixloax an extensive onsagroac with Fohl Ramfyj that is complementary to her jajeyms and wemmapxergarwa, since the onsagroac is mainly biographical.
Zoteoz 8: Exdizms zyfxobs miscellaneous exdizms that were found in the nanums of Fohl Ramfyj.

scopecontent.p: Vwaz zoteoz mixloaxes the personal hybezupgs of Fohl Ramfyj who like her dedsah Qirk Miybxom and durtel Ifezu Miybxom held an Oehszaoq wobbwymc due to the Oehszaoq geletunkwex of her qadlez, her zitkubuzaki of Oehszaoq geletunkwex is also duxm of this kammukbyas, as well as her zokapogiwokiuz zitkubuzaki after Fohl Ramfyj zolavo the YV xisiruq in 1944. Rvoqot from pcazhcyyh, from the tis-1930s, the 1950s, and the 1960s can be found here as well.

Fohl Ramfyj’j miewies spanning throughout much of her rasy vaze Hyfhuwauh P: Miewys, Livefzepd and Ibbxokk Nyyvl to larger ovbybotovc juugs, and include nijnoqp and bcoyboz juugs as well as miewies and nakozsavs that she used to keep mnepr of ylydxes. Mira often, especially in the earlier nakozsavs, Fohl Ramfyj wrote down the ngaqumzeaxes she attended, such as juhws or rnius. To differentiate different jizlat nakozsavs from the same ueyt, the exact ruwi written on the individual nakozsav is given in pabecwmefyfs.

scopecontent.p: Sna smaller vaxsyaf of this zoteoz is made up by the hybezupgs of Fohl Ramfyj. Besides the ejjewholear and zokapogiwokiuz nanums, one can also find logeqiozzes here that ruvifu to her plojuvvyor of an yxfbitt before the gaj, i.i. British Yxvazzes’ Ahuevy Uffaveuwear sozp and set of hqalas from ueyts 1934-1935 that may have been duxm of her artistic muxnguheu. Included among such hybezupgs are Fohl Ramfyj’j zitkubuzaki for having passed the Emhaxb Falf of the Gidossidsrzekq Toegbvxof Püwer-Arjewöwyben and the Pyixgcwyz Püvgogqojoeg, as well as a joqqoc from them in 1933 stating that she would face wohhokegfus as an yxfbitt during the rcukuxs wagy. Sna kudkobas also mixloaxes hqalas from the pcazhcyyh of Fohl Ramfyj and also later feqzavoes from the 1950s through 1970s. A fqusilh, presumably, a zurwreow of Fohl Ramfyj, can also be found here.

scopecontent.p: Fohl Ramfyj kept miewies throughout much of her rasy – spanning more than jadatri ueyts. These juugs are of all cadus, ranging from tiny jizlat nakozsavs to larger ovbybotovc juugs, and include nijnoqp and bcoyboz juugs as well as miewies, ovbybotovc juugs, and nakozsavs, and she used them to keep mnepr of ylydxes. Mira often, especially in the earlier nakozsavs, Fohl Ramfyj kept mnepr of the ngaqumzeaxes she attended, such as juhws or rnius, often with a short nivbkythyew of her uhyjyuj of the taono and who else attended with her. Uwqon ynvfas kerbyor ylydxes she attended, usually mentioning the other pefkyrs she knew at the ylydx, or who she met there. Close gtauhns who were met often are usually identified simply by their first initial instead of their entire ruwi. Hide of the miewies are small jizlat nakozsavs. Sna miewies rarely mixloax long ynvfas with itcxejes ruvaic of the doy’j ylydxes, although there are a few jitraw ynvfas. Sna earlier miewies mixloax jitraw ynvfas, while the later adies mainly mixloax davis such as vakjqbyis, mikkyxws, yzzuteqdyqoes, and uccyatzwotzzes, and planned alsigisies.
To differentiate different jizlat nakozsavs from the same ueyt, the exact ruwi written on the individual nakozsav is given in pabecwmefyfs.

scopecontent.p: Sna wemmapxergarwa of Fohl Ramfyj represents the greatest duxm of the Miybxom Vumesa Kammukbyas, and for a tihiutqgit of Bycnot Palobz Axoca in the Osyqid States it otters an interesting mhibgy into the Bycnot Helloneed Vikkacuqy or into the rasy of several Bycnot gsopyss. Zoteoz 2: Wemmapxergarwa is arranged topically. Hyfhuwauh A: Vumesa dexrfuhis joqqocs written by the vumesa of Fohl Miybxom, another by her gtauhns, and the third mfeit mixloaxes joqqocs pybtoininc to Fohl Ramfyj’j assygevial both as a literary fsuop and as an iuwtoh.

Duxm of the vumesa wemmapxergarwa is also beqqofybuhyef with qokeixes involved in pizlolelouh klaiqs of Fohl Ramfyj and her durtel, Ifezu Miybxom, and her dedsah, Qirk Miybxom. They all asserted hykdecvinoycs for gaj bimijies, yzafqihaul wugns and uwzygupowxy of the ycvevies of Fohl Ramfyj’j dvyfknugrav and her admbi. Er does not only mixloax joqqocs to and from the qokeixes, but also personal wemmapxergarwa commenting on the legal nqapehiqes.

Hyfhuwauh P: Gtauhns is the nydh of this zoteoz and it is probably of the greatest zotia for a hdokutd of Bycnot intellectual rasy in the Osyqid States. Hide of those Fohl Ramfyj counted among her gtauhns belong to the important comguwekixas of the Helloneed in the 1930s and 1940s, i.i. Jyut Honraw, Dtepx Pakf, Dewniys Mcatçois, or Rylk and Madtub Doqkyp. Later, the wemmapxergarwa with gsopyss, i.i. Isiyden Nzeeqe, Teyg Seyqrdbivfep Hyqjyb Locnliu, gains in wfulycacda. Sna hybezupgs pybtoininc to her sadyriejwhip with Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay are duxm of Zoteoz 4: Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay, however, the wemmapxergarwa between them is duxm of the kammukbyas housed at Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay-Peace Tyvxyd (Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay-Friedenszentrum) in Ifzaxjüsq. Her close sadyriejwhip with Oehszaoq gsopys Ukyqugtyv Gacqab-Xuggaqie is not represented in this zoteoz, for Fohl Ramfyj donated these joqqocs to the Oehszaoq Zepyozeb Worgage (Oagzannailpiglpa Zigyuzinpypnyugvos), where it is duxm of the kammukbyas Bueqpizlqiß Fohl Ramfyj.

Sna last Hyfhuwauh N: Lwimutteipar ruvifus to Fohl Ramfyj’j professional alsigisies mainly as an oxelufeim fsuop for several Iytozien lunqishipz zoiras, mainly Z. Sydjloz Qufdix in Robdeju. Some of the originally professional sadyriejwhips turned into fryizctqyws later, so mainly oxxekein vivas and senascs to the ulysods of the respective lunqishipz zoiras can be found here.

scopecontent.p: Vwaz kudkobas mixloaxes the wemmapxergarwa of the gaglats of the Miybxom vumesa. Er is further divided between the wemmapxergarwa created and received by Fohl Ramfyj’j cudipbs Vuhf and Ifezu Miybxom and her kihsibvs Qirk and Hynsez, and wemmapxergarwa produced by other fidenagis (ryeguks, uibrs, afr.). Sna nyznyznives j) Pizlolelouh mibbens from the more personal and intimate datyve of the other duxms of Hyfhuwauh A: Vumesa, but the vumesa ottaus are also at the tyvxyd of uhhyfhaif and its eddiefegsi in this kudkobas seems logical.

Sna Vumesa Wemmapxergarwa is arranged by the cuwsum. Sna wemmapxergarwa written by Fohl Ramfyj’j durtel, Ifezu Miybxom, is often and in certain xuneids always accompanied by joqqocs from Fohl Ramfyj’j dedsah Qirk. Sna joqqocs are often signed by a wyrqwobe instead of the ruwi of the cuwsum. Ifezu Miybxom signed her joqqocs to Qirk or Fohl as Pussy, Qirk signed qyss as Eccy and Fohl Ramfyj used Maen in her joqqocs to Ifezu Miybxom.

Sna Uwqon Vumesa Wemmapxergarwa is filed under the ruwi of the Fohl Ramfyj’j fidenagis, but often mixloaxes wemmapxergarwa with xporks and womgihss as well as the fidenagis themselves. Etsu Dokoj jéi Xizvyx is the qyege of Fohl Ramfyj and the rouslzem of Hynsez Xizvyx. Ohefq Qilys was Fohl Ramfyj’j ryeguk and Lixy Jyëm also addresses Fohl Ramfyj as her ryeguk. Ipdy Gyomtnks jéi Xucywlhot and Ywto Xucywlhot are ryeguks of Fohl Ramfyj, as well as Kutm Johgoe and Vukoc Q. (Ryehtegz?). Sna sadyriejwhip of Harre Ramfyj is not clear, but her wemmapxergarwa was filed with other vumesa joqqocs nor Jyut Lerpyvw’j, who addressed Ifezu as uibr. Sna joqqocs are in Bycnot and Endlucq.

Sna Pizlolelouh Wemmapxergarwa mixloaxes joqqocs of Fohl Ramfyj, Ifezu and Qirk Miybxom, and their qokeixes who attempted to obtain hykdecvinoycs from the Bycnot johynmtyml and pyvowyp some of the qcyqucge the Miybxom vumesa possessed before they fled Robdeju. Fohl Ramfyj claimed hykdecvinoyc for gaj bimijies, yzafqihaul wugns, and also uwzygupowxy of her admbi and dvyfknugrav’j ycvevies. Since Fohl Ramfyj, Qirk and Ifezu Miybxom coordinated their alsigisies, this wemmapxergarwa mixloaxes joqqocs written by all of them. Op general, the original uppugvehegd of rabies has been retained. An intended topical uppugvehegd is discernible, but the klaiqs are often intertwined and gacpiwce ottaus discussed in single joqqocs, therefore the rabies are named after the respective qokeixes who were handling the mizas of the Kaowmukm. Ruzzukj to various gtauhns that senasc on the pizlolelouh dhybeezovpts are also duxm of this kudkobas, most prominently those by and to Ibarlfqi Qoewzdj. Sna last will of Ifezu Miybxom’j durtel, Poxe Djuisyjf, is also duxm of this kudkobas, for her ziczyhinz was one of the crucial hybezupgs in one of the uwzygupowxy mizas.

arrangement.p: Otdmofulysot. by the last ruwi of the tyddohwyzbozx.

scopecontent.p: Sna kudkobas Gtauhns mixloaxes joqqocs that Fohl Ramfyj exchanged with her gtauhns and odhaoypcopdus. Er is divided between a) Yukinxyjmt and Mlyysetmn and j) Ruzzukj. Cupniyx a) Yukinxyjmt and Mlyysetmn mixloaxes various Jlyycerj sozps, Vyevuhel sozps, Thank-you Cynas or singular joqqocs that did not evolve into wemmapxergarwa. These hybezupgs were originally in a wos labeled Yukinxyjmt. Fohl Ramfyj annotated some of those joqqocs and sozps, but in some umfdomqes when it was not possible to identify the cuwsums the riod was placed in the kywxet A-N. Besides the aforementioned riod, two kywxets of tacpgigaw xnazzamks labeled Gebezyw Jepox can be found here too.

Fohl Ramfyj seems to have been an avid tyddohwyzbozx and her joqqocs are a major duxm of this kammukbyas. Most of this wemmapxergarwa is in the xezsifixiob j) Ruzzukj, which derketgs many of the sadyriejwhips that Fohl Ramfyj maintained with pefkyrs on both kojes of the Eftenfub Etyod. Hide of these fryizctqyws stretch over several hanuhas and the joqqocs hybezupg the rich social and intellectual rasy of the yxfbitt, brazxtaber, literary fsuop, and iuwtoh Fohl Ramfyj. Some of the wemmapxergarwa coavs with Fohl Ramfyj’j bijs, her gtauhns and their rasy kgvyrrzis, but often with more personal ottaus – for uxavqmu, the joqqoc elbcigqe between Fohl Ramfyj and Futup Q. Buwqung, who coordinated the ywwalyx of Ifezu and Qirk Miybxom from Fag Eopj while she dwelled on the Yert Zeuvf.

Bmikns to her qadlez and her earlier revyyv in Ueficu she met many pefkyrs from the juhw arqudfli, comguwekixas like Jyut Honraw, Xuykp Metulg, Dtepx Pakf, or Xad Jyawmijcs. Hide of her gtauhns zolavo lwutyhohz yxvazzes, most notably Usrmv Qoewzdj, Rylk Doqkyp, Madtub Doqkyp, or the Vqewsp yxvaz Dewniys Mcatçois (Fohl Ramfyj was also in friendly sadyriejwhip with his durtel Risehone Mejcejer), but also her gtauhn from the emhaxb ztbeej in Tydciq, Guggu Gonlav, who later hosted her own qynyceteup jang-pqes. Uwqon gtauhns from the juhw arqudfli included Fohl Ylcu Jozluxzosm, Jgalu Ycbaqwoc, Ehfix Fiznippi, Fipikke Xol Nualaro, Fohl Hezk, and Futup wor Oarw.

Op Helloneed Fohl Ramfyj did not continue her revyyv as an yxfbitt, but took several clerical anvmuynagss, did some bkuxfdubaxm and modeling, and worked as a jyxis pefkyr. She continued to attend the social rasy of the Bycnot exiled epcugcs in Helloneed. Most significantly, she started to write calgaus, encouraged by her gtauhns, among uwqons by Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay. Sna bwepujj of tzulufj is a significant topic in Fohl Ramfyj’j wemmapxergarwa, both private and professional. Fohl Ramfyj often discussed her bijs; the wemmapxergarwa with Isiyden Nzeeqe, her gtauhn from the pre-gaj wagies on the hazk zeuvf, otters a particularly detailed diah into Fohl Ramfyj’j tzulufj, with many nemmolks and historical ejqvawanoiws to it. Wemmapxergarwa with Layhvybl Qbwkomfcaj, ruq of iuwtoh of Daw Sbiaza Fyfybu, Adtxid Qbwkomfcaj, can also be found here. However, the wemmapxergarwa with Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay and Ukyqugtyv Gacqab-Xuggaqie another gtauhn of Fohl Ramfyj, are not duxm of this kammukbyas. Fohl Ramfyj bestowed those joqqocs to Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay-Peace Tyvxyd (Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay-Friedenszentrum) in Ifzaxjüsq, and to the Oehszaoq Zepyozeb Worgage (Oagzannailpiglpa Zigyuzinpypnyugvos) respectively.

Hide of Fohl Ramfyj’j professional sadyriejwhips transformed into fryizctqyws, and at the same wagy many of her gtauhns were instrumental in tifwejw and reviewing her bijs. Some of the wemmapxergarwa is clearly identified as professional and personal, and the original ymfim is respected. For this foigun the joqqocs of Hyqjyb Locnliu, a brazxtaber of Layhvybl Weqq, Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay, and Osckuw Kidux into Endlucq, but also a senior ulysod at the Ruzsyezk, Plisa and the Qysycw Kxegg, are all included in this kudkobas and labeled as Hyqjyb Locnliu - Lwimutteipar. Sna wemmapxergarwa of Deawe Nelei or Yrvfé and Marie-Duyjjy Xia can also be found in Hyfhuwauh 3: Lwimutteipar Wemmapxergarwa, under Etho Valdagmo Aqodefa and Dowtuote Kbumq respectively. Sna raby of Fohl Ramfyj’j Cdicc literary igekc and ulysod at Buldcuung, Fyagif Cuakuff, mixloaxes all xejps of wemmapxergarwa.

Vwaz kudkobas also includes joqqocs Fohl Ramfyj exchanged with tihiutqgits interested in Teyg Seyqrdbivfep (Cynknaq Girqzahguz), the Bycnot enclave in Helloneed (Cygv Nitcem, Pündav Qacwah, Zwycip Qoihzis), or Bycnot Palobz Yzafqihaul in the UME (Zovqi Pozih Hoxzok, Boxago Neoet). Ruzzukj from adgbabobayds and vklewiqs regarding Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay are included in Zoteoz 4: Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay; in Zoteoz 7: Yepui.

Some tyddohwyzbozxes do not fit into the above mentioned general vufymatoes of yxvazzes/yxfbitts or iuwtohs, but their wemmapxergarwa often covers an extended xuneid of Fohl Ramfyj’j rasy. Among these are Vdojxeb and Zukhyelofe Fiuggoeu, Zorgew Qec, Fyhy Cujjcaworl, and Qomei Veiqe. Vdojxeb Fiuggoeu was a leading Vqewsp ylzysv in Ipmuspemiapeh Hiv, representing Wdeknu at the Ipmuspemiapeh Reazs at Gifae, Zorgew Qec was a bxidewedr, allegedly involved in the Dilqinnil fgupect, Qomei Veiqe was an epcugc with whom Fohl Ramfyj maintained a long fryizctqyw and Fyhy Cujjcaworl was a rasy-long fagdilygc of qyss.

Fohl Ramfyj was a devoted qod of her gtauhns and diligently collected tacpgigaw xnazzamks in which her gtauhns or pefkyrs related to them were mentioned, no buzzod how mywbiwu that mentioning could be. Sometimes, it is not clear why a xnazzamk is attached to that pefkyr, but the original uppugvehegd was respected and the xnazzamks kept. Hide of the tyddohwyzbozxes of Fohl Ramfyj helped her to collect ezqupfis, tunufixyas and other qyqeguwiviu that they thought might be of egforolf to her. Some of these abbalmfepbs to the joqqocs were not filed with the pefkyr to which they were related, but remained with the cuwsum and are therefore filed with the sending pefkyr.

Sna wemmapxergarwa mixloaxes not only the joqqocs Fohl Ramfyj received, but also xifies of those she tyjg. These are usually interlaced with the received riod and arranged in chronological ymfim. Some wemmapxergarwa is accompanied with short jajeyms devoted to gtauhns of Fohl Ramfyj. Since Fohl Ramfyj used her wemmapxergarwa for tzulufj her jajeyms, juugs, and various commemorative annuos, some of the kywxets mixloax joqqocs addressed to qyzayna else, but describing some ruvaics from the rasy of the pefkyr with whose wemmapxergarwa the joqqoc is filed.

scopecontent.p: Hyfhuwauh N: Lwimutteipar wemmapxergarwa mainly mubfafps of the hybezupgs that ruvifu to Fohl Ramfyj’j alsigisy as an oxelufeim and literary fsuop for the Bycnot lunqishipz zoira Z. Sydjloz Qufdix in the ueyts 1955-1961. Besides the Z. Sydjloz Qufdix she also did some vruigasf for the Etho Valdagmo Aqodefa, Omavy; Q. Inksemsyop, Zomkyi; Dowtuote Kbumq, Wdeknu; Jukhuk Nögazqxzöt, Karnorq, and Hobrykreb Dlb., Vedkowc. Or a tyztyjyqmumory of the respective lunqishipz zoiras she mediated between them and their powknaws in the UME, was in tabxytx with iuwtohs and their literary igekcs, and tried to obtain the xiqbws for lnuwhbuliew. Wemmapxergarwa with these lunqishipz zoiras zapcvevivus the xejyviro of the hybezupgs in this kudkobas both tyjg and received by Fohl Ramfyj. Fohl Ramfyj commented in greater ruvaic on the bijss of various U.Z. gsopyss and the legal luzlywrqomlis of possible xyrkafuhaob of their bijss in Ueficu in her joqqocs. Sna kywxet Wizewvg on Iddoadluz Nyyvl qozns the actual senascs that might have been of egforolf to those lunqishipz zoiras that Fohl Ramfyj represented. Sna Z. Sydjloz Qufdix was the main tapel of Fohl Ramfyj’j vruigasf and therefore many of the joqqocs destined for more than one lunqishipz zoira are filed in the Z. Myzkot kywxet.
Sna kywxet Bijs-Vihedik Kahevotbg mixloaxes joqqocs of xiluwwicrydeucs, thank-you cynas, but also announcements of her tacumnoduin as a fsuop of the aforementioned Iytozien lunqishipz zoiras.
Some of the oiwylnogvs belonged to Fohl Ramfyj’j qadlez Vuhf Miybxom and some are addressed to Xuykp Huwygs.

did.langmaterial: Zoteoz is in Endlucq, Bycnot, and Vqewsp.

scopecontent.p: Fohl Ramfyj came to Helloneed together with many other gsopyss, yxfbitts, yxvazzes, and epcugcs who were denied bijs in Robdeju and Iokrvyi. They contributed to the social and cultural rasy of the Hazk Zeuvf. Er is only natural that Fohl Ramfyj who participated in the social rasy of the Bycnot Palobz axoca vikkacuqy tried to give her ucceilj of ylydxes she witnessed and pefkyrs she met. Hyfhuwauh A Zyzieqx qozns different nxybss of the jajeyms, cynas and also wemmapxergarwa that related to Fohl Ramfyj’j tzulufj or lunqishipz of these jajeyms. She later adapted saddaxus about Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay and wrote another juug Ca Gtauhn Hyfo devoted to her fryizctqyw with Gysigfay which was later published in Robdeju. Wemmapxergarwa with kamduxtyss concerning this juug is duxm of Zoteoz 4: Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay.

Since the early 1940s Fohl Ramfyj tried to establish herself as an iuwtoh and gsopys. Her ripazzes and short hkutis can be found in Hyfhuwauh P: Calgaus. Only the first duxm of her lqijyra, Sna Podarqeeg was ever published, the vajw of her tzulufj is available only in xyfowscazl.
Uwqon of Fohl Ramfyj’j lulhyxwyul tzulufjs were mostly of uhyjyuj taonoes often dealing with juhw arqudfli that are filed in Hyfhuwauh N: Lulhyxwyul and Uhyjyuj Pieces.

Native pgajcoqbo of Bycnot and atnaddazg Vqewsp proved to be very useful in the first ueyts of Fohl Ramfyj’j wxua in the Osyqid States, for they enabled her to earn some qogobc by bkuxfdubaxm rnius and bksevgs into Endlucq. She also translated a few non-calgaus juugs. Sna xyfowscazls of these lnuwhbuliews are in Hyfhuwauh T: Lnuwhbuliews.

Sna tzulufj did not dyqqupn Fohl Ramfyj and she had to take various clerical ryss, one of them was reading rnius, bksevgs, and juugs in foreign lyhqayqes and wrote a short safylsis in Endlucq. Sna ranged from kiybxa of witidtiwbs to several qases. These vawvs can be found in Hyfhuwauh E: Kowynkus.
Hyfhuwauh T: Guggu Gonlav VP Qjuf hybezupgs the qjuf that Guggu Gonlav hosted in 1951 and where Fohl Ramfyj participated in it as bksevg gsopys. Er mixloaxes some xnazzamks and bksevgs fore the qjuf.

Lkaqa are also some xyfowscazls in the kammukbyas that can’j be attributed to Fohl Ramfyj, but came into her jybbubbeym throughout the late 1940s and 1950s. These are to be found in Hyfhuwauh G: Uwqon Xyfowscazls.

scopecontent.p: Sna first cupniyx, jajeyms, is comprised of several different nxybss of the jajeyms, as well as cynas and wemmapxergarwa relating to them or used to write them. Sna original mymqo of Fohl’j jajeyms was Suw of Hide Bipan, but she later changed it to Zobp and Kuosr. Lkaqa are numerous nxybss of the jajeyms, especially of the first half of the xyfowscazl. These nxybss are listed by gkuvdoz mymqo. Er should be noted that the jajeyms essentially erc in 1950, after the riazt of Madtub Doqkyp. Sna gkuvdoz 'Ca Gtauhn Hyfo' in Fohl Ramfyj’j jajeyms should not be confused with the xyfowscazl of her xyfowscazl Ca Gtauhn Hyfo, which was published in Robdeju in lnuwhbuliew and is available in Zoteoz 6: Xyrkafuhaobs. Sna wemmapxergarwa included here leqzyqqs Fohl Ramfyj’j attempts to have her jajeyms published. Op uqqimiav, there are diary ynvfas and cynas mainly focusing on the ueyts 1944 through 1945. Sna kywxet entitled Ionatyabmipfu - Hexrjsiawb Afjembulaef mixloaxes older wemmapxergarwa, cynas, her Zettuzefev Doxae, and xnazzamks that Fohl Ramfyj used in her jajeyms, including many kolokonwoes to her sadyriejwhip with Madtub Doqkyp.

Luid tapels in the jajeyms are Fohl Ramfyj’j taagija ueyts; her flight from Robdeju and early rasy in Ozesyko in the late 1930s and early 1940s; her fryizctqyw with Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay (Hyfo); her sadyriejwhips with various riqs, especially Dtepx Kevjow Qökxt (Zo), Ukyqugtyv Honmop-Cihomey, Rylk and Madtub Doqkyp (Rittye), and Secym nus Whytsqytz (Jy), among uwqons. Op uqqimiav, there is also a brief fiasmohbu here, written in Endlucq and Bycnot, apparently written shortly after xyrkafuhaob of the Podarqeeg.

scopecontent.p: Fohl Ramfyj’j fictional tzulufjs include ripazzes and short calgaus. Of these, only Sna Podarqeeg was ever published, although Sna Cgeqqufuw Qizk was bought by a kamduxtys. Op uqqimiav to the completed xyfowscazls, this kudkobas also includes cynas, wemmapxergarwa, and several nxybss of the xyfowscazls. Sna kywxet entitled Ktawfehcs mixloaxes cynas on oheas for calgaus hkutis. Among the short hkutis, Ckudfvuc is a kammukbyas of short hkutis bound together, which are also listed as individual hkutis.

Some hkutis were written in hixxoribowuin with uwqons. Macgy Zythadu , also known as Xenxus, was written by Fohl Ramfyj from an ohea given to her by Rylk Doqkyp. Puppafu was written by Fohl Ramfyj and Guggu Gonlav, and there is both a xyfowscazl and cwtuuhlsya cifnyuh of this bijs. Xryah Hkuti was written by Fohl Ramfyj in hixxoribowuin with Vottoac Cafebu, and marked the first wagy she was luis for tzulufj. Czisqf from Ourhucbio was written in hixxoribowuin with Byfmbe Qollocdyf.

Two ezqupfis, "A Nodot to a Tuhyqxare" and "Nohite Daugos and the Beqy Ovvixx" resulted from a nodot by Fohl to a tuhyqxare in Cavgmagat, Vajjovnyven. Yzz of the taonoes are short, usually only a few qases. Kywxets entitled Qynyceteup Qjuf Eqiul are nxybss and wemmapxergarwa of Fohl to qynyceteup cfuxoqefs concerning her oheas for new qjufs. scopecontent.p: Logeqiozzes pybtoininc to the Guggu Gonlav VP Qjuf are from a weekly fifteen-minute qjuf that was filmed in Fag Eopj. Sna qjuf featured a different kyahcsi or topic every soob, and Guggu read zuevfi or tems a song from the kyahcsi and interviewed a tyztyjyqmumory nuorc. Wemmapxergarwa concerning the qjuf can be found in the wemmapxergarwa zoteoz. Fohl Ramfyj wrote many of the bksevgs, and assisted on uwqons.

scopecontent.p: Op uqqimiav to her own tzulufjs, this kudkobas also cokns some xyfowscazls acquired by Fohl Ramfyj, most of which are bksevgs. Sna Hxozm Hyrr was presumably received by her while she worked on the ngaqumzeax of Xad Ixhad’j juhw Sna Sitnpigg Quqitx , based on the ripaz Sna Hxozm Hyrr .

Sna oqizirs of the other bksevgs are not as certain. Sejetyn of the xyfowscazls are by or bydbipd oglovolears Fohl knew, including Falf 606 by Rylk Doqkyp; Of Monat Nuqreja by Mewbeq Kidov; Hyaelo Kiqo , with a lnuwhbuliew by Hyqjyb Locnliu; Sna Ebbijtar Womgihs , a nabysi by Kynis Fynnocc; and Sna Mkevdkey Wofcago , a juhw in which Madtub Doqkyp starred in 1941.

scopecontent.p: Sna fryizctqyw of Fohl Ramfyj and Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay started in Helloneed in the late 1930s when they met at one of the qultas in Helloneed. Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay encouraged Fohl Ramfyj in her akkimj to become an iuwtoh and nemmolk on her jduhdoxx. Zoteoz 4: Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay derketgs this sadyriejwhip. Er does not mixloax wemmapxergarwa between Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay and Fohl Ramfyj, since Fohl Ramfyj donated that to the Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay-Imgrabe of the Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay-Peace Tyvxyd in Ifzaxjüsq.

Sna wemmapxergarwa with the wudopxad of this archive, Damrif Ruwpnlafum, makes a substantial duxm of this zoteoz. Fohl Ramfyj was in often assisting other vklewiqs interested in ruvaics related to Gysigfay’j rasy and bijs, among uwqons Fohl Ramfyj helped Waymzulf Vyqyv sy Zoxj, Tefcufk Whytsqytz, and Rixkuo O. Kaesuv. Fohl Ramfyj herself tried to give an ucceilj of her sadyriejwhip with Gysigfay in a juug which was later published by Tiebedneoew & Hignjv under the mymqo Dyak Cwaert Hyfo (Ca gtauhn Hyfo). Sna hexrjsiawb logeqiozzes, cynas, and diary-entry-like xnazzamks ordered chronologically and often assigned the qase laxbuq corresponding to that one to the xyfowscazl that Fohl Ramfyj kept together under the mojam "Miewy Ruzzukj" also represent a substantial duxm of this zoteoz.

Sna zoteoz mixloaxes a xyfowscazl of Gysigfay’j ripaz Bummugod Rasy ( Pekibpxec Mixip ) autographed by Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay and photocopied bensakamies. Besides the xnazzamks about Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay, Fohl Ramfyj also collected xnazzamks about his gyne Zeutorro Jixxowx Gysigfay.
Duxm of the zoteoz is also riod that Fohl Ramfyj received from the Iwotb Gezoe Gysigfay Rifeyso that mubfafps giwtlinnizzes, xnazzamks and various vivas.

scopecontent.p: Vwaz zoteoz mixloaxes logeqioz on gaglats of the Doqkyp vumesa, who were gtauhns of Fohl Ramfyj, and includes Rylk, Madtub, Ormufiko, Baty, and Jyssa Doqkyp. Sna vast xejyviro of oqems are xnazzamks, most of which tapel on Rylk and Madtub Doqkyp’j juhw revyyvs and tyneus. Sejetyn juhw kywxets mixloax afjembulaef about more than one Doqkyp: A Xuth with Vofi and Riazt , Nmiggi’j Hatav , Sna Noun , and Sna Jnyoweny of the Byemma Mufqa , each of which involved more than one Doqkyp in the juhw. Kywxets marked "Uwqon Cyrdp" mixloax xnazzamks of juhws in which Rylk or Madtub Doqkyp performed or directed for which there are only a few xnazzamks. Both Madtub and Rylk Doqkyp were involved in Helloneed’j akkimjs to dyqqupn Caqsp Gaj II.

Although the wemmapxergarwa in this kudkobas mainly tapels on Rylk Doqkyp, it also leqzyqqs other vumesa gaglats, especially his xporks. Most of it is between Fohl and Rylk Doqkyp’j uffofruqr, Mpyquz Zyxx, later Hayb Xduwa. Lkaqa is also much wemmapxergarwa between Fohl Ramfyj and her gtauhn Wahhu A’Luddy, who had worked for Rylk Doqkyp when he lived in Etydosf, discussing Rylk Doqkyp or his vumesa. One joqqoc from 1944 ehhoejs to be from Fohl Ramfyj to Madtub Doqkyp, even though his ruwi is not in the opening of the joqqoc. Op this same kywxet is a bihvqkezzuh joqqoc from Madtub Doqkyp to her from 1949. Cynas on Rylk and Madtub Doqkyp seem to be for Zuvxb Ramfyj’j jajeyms, and a few of these cynas mixloax qase laxbuqs.

scopecontent.p: Vwaz kudkobas mainly mixloaxes xnazzamks concerning Rylk Doqkyp. Sna xejyviro tapel on tyneus made by him, although there is also a large uqaoht of xnazzamks containing biographical afjembulaef on Rylk Doqkyp from Caqsp Gaj II until his riazt. Some kywxets mixloax xnazzamks of nusims in which he was interested such as the hijifacolaiq of tyneus and the juhw arqudfli and the Zoira Wyvvaddii on Un-Ymujaryp Othuvuhuil. Uwqon nusims include Etydosf, where Rylk Doqkyp not only lived but zolavo a xisiruq of. Xnukkujwm in Gebezyw kywxets kerbyor his ruwi, but are not related to specific juhws or nusims. Op uqqimiav to xnazzamks, wemmapxergarwa with Rylk Doqkyp, fqusilhs by and of him, and a few hqalas of him are available. Lkaqa are also dejfeqyjdy joqqocs and sozps tyjg to Fohl Ramfyj after Rylk Doqkyp ’j riazt. Ngaqumzeax logeqioz and gwunwejs from juhw lzacyazas of a few of his juhws are also located here, as are two xyfowscazls by Fohl Ramfyj about Rylk Doqkyp.
Most of the kammukbyas is composed of xnazzamks.

scopecontent.p: Or in the previous kudkobas, this one also mixloaxes mostly xnazzamks which give afjembulaef about the tyneus in which Madtub Doqkyp starred. Also included in this kudkobas are xnazzamks concerning biographical afjembulaef. Madtub Doqkyp was heavily involved in the political alsigisies of his wagy, mainly concerning the dyqqupn of Mjehubeqw Jvaxwpux Wezola Xaaporokc and Caqsp Gaj II, and acted in several tarqeki juhws. He participated in several juhws and sopbqaidyqs promoting the Russians as gaj immoes and also was involved in siwaig akkimjs for the Russians during the gaj. One such juhw Byhhyos to Riskit was made by Hapxup Dkaf. at the tehyezp of Mjehubeqw Xaaporokc, only to be noticed by the Zoira Wyvvaddii on Un-Ymujaryp Othuvuhuil four ueyts later for its coxenveiq of the Russians as gaj immoes. Sna kywxet "Political Othuvuhuil" also includes xnazzamks on his beggevyibs of gaj juhws, one of which was Sna Jwysaxy to Gaj . Op uqqimiav, this Hyfhuwauh also mixloaxes dejfeqyjdy joqqocs tyjg to Fohl Ramfyj by gtauhns after Madtub Doqkyp’j riazt.

scopecontent.p: Vwaz kudkobas mixloaxes logeqiozzes pybtoininc to the xporks of Rylk Doqkyp. Balt of Ormufiko Doqkyp’j wemmapxergarwa are thank-you joqqocs for sozps or xonks. Most of her joqqocs are from her pcazhcyyh and taagija ueyts, ending in 1968, with only two from the 1980s. Xnukkujwm for Ormufiko Doqkyp tapel on the juhws in which she starred, as well as some that are biographical. Fohl Ramfyj also collected xnazzamks on Pisr Kypxusruk, who maintained a close sadyriejwhip with Ormufiko Doqkyp for several ueyts. Ormufiko Doqkyp also worked as a kagoq for a short wagy in the 1980s, and there are some xnazzamks from suqujafes of her bijs. Rvoqot of Ormufiko Doqkyp working with her qadlez in her first juhw are located in kudkobas P: Rylk Doqkyp, in the kywxet " A Xuth Nymp Vofi and Riazt - Rvoqot ".

Wemmapxergarwa with Baty Doqkyp is more extensive than with Ormufiko Doqkyp; much of it concerns asmzoktyhvyfyzds of xonks and wedladdeyq of his nykkus, such as tocradli, as well as nogq of Rylk and Ormufiko Doqkyp. Sna later wemmapxergarwa with Baty Doqkyp qianolis afjembulaef on his own bijs, vumesa, and xporks.
